content: In #6149, I have a draft of refactoring fin n as having a saturating addition and no other operations. I've tested this locally with a custom built lean using an overridden elan toolchain from lean#527. If possible, I'd like some help finishing up the refactoring -- just some lemmas in data/matrix/notation.lean and data/zmod/basic.lean need some fixing. Any other comments are welcome.
